content.raw:
Good point. I’ve added it \(untested for now\).

P.S. This device is not as fast, and is more expensive than the one Rory is developing with, so this pull request shouldn’t discourage him from porting his FPGA device to labscript! I wrote this about 3 years ago, mainly to try and help Martijn move away from Cicero, but just never pushed it to a repo until now.
